topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a285da6368721efb001119#post_55a285da6368721efb001119
The plot's silly, but here goes. The main character, Keima Katsuragi, is the god of dating sims, but IRL, he's a nerd who's _way_ too obsessed with them, and he's recruited by the demon world because of his skills. What's his job? To make girls who have been possessed by dormant demons inside them that will cause havoc if they despair to fall in love with him to exorcise them.
topics.author: 554d477e63687270dee30600
